mapper.select: SELECT bi.*, bp.package_id, bp.package_code, bp.package_name, bp.package_supply_id FROM bas_item bi inner JOIN bas_package bp ON bi.item_id = bp.item_id inner join bas_owner bo on bo.owner_id = bi.owner_id WHERE 1 = 1 --@ and bi.item_id = #{item_id} --@ and bi.item_code = #{item_code} --@ and bo.owner_code = #{owner_code}
